title: koTTam aDangi
sahitya:
koTTam aDangi shummA iruppAyE manak-kurangE un cETTayai viDuppAyE



anupallavi



kuTTik-karaNam pOTTUk-kuppaiyil vizhuginrAn kuDikArap-pEi pOlE

kUkkura viDuginrAi



caraNam 1



pozhudaik-kolai paNNum pullaraik-kUDAdE poyyinai meiyenrE buddhi

keTTODAdE

kazhudaikku upadEshitta mozhi ena naDakkAdE karaDi I OTTiya kadaiyai naDikkAdE   



caraNam 2



vanjap-pulan vazhiyE vAshaluk-kODAdE vambu vazhakkugaLai valiya

nI toDAdE

kuncita pAdattai konjam viTTaganrAyO koDuppEn udai vAlai

veDukken-raruppEnaDA
